title: 18-year-old shot, killed by 15-year-old on Southwest Side
content:
SAN ANTONIO — An 18-year-old died Thursday morning after being shot in the chest by a 15-year-old at a home on the Southwest Side.
The victim and suspect, both males, had been hanging out inside a home in the 5400 block of War Cloud Street around 12:15 a.m. with several of their friends prior to the shooting, according to police.
One of the friends had brought a gun to the house and let the 15-year-old hold it. As he did so, he fired one shot, firing a bullet into the chest of the 18-year-old.
The alleged shooter ran from the scene with the weapon along with the others in the room.
Emergency medical crews arrived and tried to revive the victim, but he was pronounced dead shortly after the incident.
